Description:
Detects process access requests to LSASS process with potentially suspicious access flags

Author: Florian Roth, Roberto Rodriguez, Dimitrios Slamaris, Mark Russinovich, Thomas Patzke, Teymur Kheirkhabarov, Sherif Eldeeb, James Dickenson, Aleksey Potapov, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potentially Suspicious GrantedAccess Flags On LSASS
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((((granted_access like '%30' or granted_access like '%50' or granted_access like '%70' or granted_access like '%90' or granted_access like '%B0' or granted_access like '%D0' or granted_access like '%F0' or granted_access like '%18' or granted_access like '%38' or granted_access like '%58' or granted_access like '%78' or granted_access like '%98' or granted_access like '%B8' or granted_access like '%D8' or granted_access like '%F8' or granted_access like '%1A' or granted_access like '%3A' or granted_access like '%5A' or granted_access like '%7A' or granted_access like '%9A' or granted_access like '%BA' or granted_access like '%DA' or granted_access like '%FA' or granted_access like '%0x14C2') and (granted_access like '0x100000%' or granted_access like '0x1418%' or granted_access like '0x1438%' or granted_access like '0x143a%' or granted_access like '0x1f0fff%' or granted_access like '0x1f1fff%' or granted_access like '0x1f2fff%' or granted_access like '0x1f3fff%' or granted_access like '0x40%')) and dst_process_path like '%\lsass.exe') and  not ((process_path like '%\explorer.exe' and granted_access = '0x401') or (process_path like '%:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Windows Defender\%' and process_path like '%\MsMpEng.exe') or ((call_trace like '%|?:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Definition Updates\{%' and call_trace like '%}\mpengine.dll+%') and granted_access = '0x1418') or (call_trace like '%|c:\program files\windows defender\mprtp.dll%' or call_trace like '%|c:\program files\windows defender\MpClient.dll%') or (process_path like '%:\Program Files (x86)\%' or process_path like '%:\Program Files\%' or process_path like '%:\Windows\System32\%' or process_path like '%:\Windows\SysWOW64\%')) and  not (process_path like '%:\ProgramData\MALWAREBYTES\MBAMSERVICE\ctlrupdate\mbupdatr.exe' or (process_path like '%:\ProgramData\VMware\VMware Tools\%' and process_path like '%\vmtoolsd.exe') or ((process_path like '%\aurora-agent-64.exe' or process_path like '%\aurora-agent.exe' or process_path like '%\thor.exe' or process_path like '%\thor64.exe') and granted_access = '0x40') or ((process_path like '%\handle.exe' or process_path like '%\handle64.exe') and granted_access = '0x40') or (process_path like '%\AppData\Local\WebEx\WebexHost.exe' and granted_access = '0x401') or process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Programs\Microsoft VS Code\Code.exe' or ((process_path like '%\PROCEXP64.EXE' or process_path like '%\PROCEXP.EXE') and granted_access = '0x40') or (process_path like '%\MBAMInstallerService.exe' and granted_access = '0x40') or process_path like '%\SteamLibrary\steamapps\%'))
